anime.description: * An animated music video of a song of http://anidb.net/s83829 [the same name], written and sung by Chuan Zi. Reminiscing on the bitter past while among friends... We were a group of reckless young teenagers, fearless in our attempt to join the "clan" (Triads). Youth isn`t forever, but our friendships continue to last within our hearts, forming beautiful memories. — Written by CDB-Man, adapted from YouTube description.

tag.name: maintenance tags
tag.description: These tags are used for maintenance.

tag.name: CAST MISSING
tag.description: Important characters are missing, either in-part or entirely. This includes basic entry info (name, gender, picture), appear episode range, seiyuu and/or tags.
